about_text: A complete deep-time narrative with unique encounters for each of twenty posthuman species, path-dependent endings, Counter-Archivist dynamics, and inclination formulas.
storyworld_title: First and Last Men: The Complete Manifold

characters.name: The Counter Archivist
characters.description: A patient anti-institution that keeps a mirror-ledger of power: it cancels quiet influence with evidence, leaks, and paradox-proof memory.

prompt_script.value: The First Men emerge in the Dawn Age. The original inheritors, still bound to flesh and familiar fears. They must declare what they value, what they will preserve, and what they will sacrifice.

text_script.value: Embrace transformation boldly
The First Men shed old constraints. Their curious nature drives them toward radical change, though some mourn what is lost.
Preserve continuity with ancestors
The First Men honor their origins. Their fragile traditions carry forward, even as the cosmos changes around them.
Let diversity flourish without doctrine
The First Men refuse to choose one path. A thousand experiments bloom, though coherence suffers.

prompt_script.value: Crisis strikes the First Men: resource wars over dwindling Earth. The Dawn Age demands a response that will shape all future generations.

text_script.value: Centralize authority to survive
Power concentrates. The First Men sacrifice autonomy for coordination, and the crisis is contained—at a cost to individual expression.
Scatter and let the fittest survive
The First Men disperse. Many perish, but the survivors carry hardened variations into the future.
Transform radically to fit the crisis
The First Men remake themselves. What emerges barely resembles what entered the crucible, but it survives.
Endure through austerity and patience
The First Men tighten their belts and wait. Generations pass in hardship, but the core endures unchanged.

prompt_script.value: The First Men face the morph-question: whether to edit the genome or preserve the sacred original. Their answer will define what 'human' means for the next epoch.

text_script.value: Enhance cognition above all
Minds expand. The First Men think thoughts their ancestors couldn't conceive, though they struggle to explain them to their children.
Optimize for physical resilience
Bodies harden. The First Men become nearly indestructible, trading flexibility for permanence.
Pursue refined pleasure and meaning
Joy deepens. The First Men cultivate experiences of such intensity that mere survival seems barbaric.
Embrace radical plasticity
Form becomes fluid. The First Men can reshape themselves at will, though identity becomes a question rather than an answer.

prompt_script.value: Not all First Men agree on the path forward. A faction emerges with a different vision, and the Dawn Age may split in two.

text_script.value: Negotiate a careful federation
Diplomacy prevails. The factions remain distinct but connected, sharing resources while pursuing separate experiments.
Let them go in peace
The First Men bid farewell to their cousins. Two branches of humanity now walk separate roads into the dark.
Enforce unity by any means
The majority compels the minority. The First Men remain one, but the cost is measured in resentment and suppressed dissent.

prompt_script.value: The First Men inherit the archives and artifacts of all who came before. What they choose to remember shapes what they can become.

text_script.value: Honor the full inheritance
Every predecessor is remembered. The First Men carry a heavy load of history, but nothing is truly lost.
Transcend the past deliberately
The First Men archive but do not worship. They learn from ancestors they have no intention of resembling.
Forget selectively for sanity
Some histories are sealed. The First Men choose psychological health over completeness, though scholars protest.

encounters.title: Age 1: First Men vs The Counter Archivist

prompt_script.value: A transmission arrives, encoded in the dead languages of extinct branches. The Counter Archivist has compiled a counter-history of the Dawn Age.

text_script.value: Engage their challenge with evidence
You meet argument with argument. The contest of narratives begins in earnest, and truth—whatever that means—may emerge from the clash.
Ignore them and proceed
You turn away. The Counter Archivist notes your dismissal with cold satisfaction. Their ledger grows heavier with your silence.
Accept some of their corrections
You yield ground strategically. The official record shifts slightly, and the Counter Archivist's hostility softens—for now.

Let them go in peace
The Eighteenth Men bid farewell to their cousins. Two branches of humanity now walk separate roads into the dark.
Enforce unity by any means
The majority compels the minority. The Eighteenth Men remain one, but the cost is measured in resentment and suppressed dissent.

prompt_script.value: The Eighteenth Men inherit the archives and artifacts of all who came before. What they choose to remember shapes what they can become.

text_script.value: Honor the full inheritance
Every predecessor is remembered. The Eighteenth Men carry a heavy load of history, but nothing is truly lost.
Transcend the past deliberately
The Eighteenth Men archive but do not worship. They learn from ancestors they have no intention of resembling.
Forget selectively for sanity
Some histories are sealed. The Eighteenth Men choose psychological health over completeness, though scholars protest.

encounters.title: Age 18: Eighteenth Men vs The Counter Archivist

prompt_script.value: Your archives have been infiltrated. The Counter Archivist has inserted doubt into your most sacred records. Which version is true?

text_script.value: Engage their challenge with evidence
You meet argument with argument. The contest of narratives begins in earnest, and truth—whatever that means—may emerge from the clash.
Ignore them and proceed
You turn away. The Counter Archivist notes your dismissal with cold satisfaction. Their ledger grows heavier with your silence.
Accept some of their corrections
You yield ground strategically. The official record shifts slightly, and the Counter Archivist's hostility softens—for now.

prompt_script.value: The Nineteenth Men emerge in the Bridge Builders. They constructed the paths for what comes after humanity. They must declare what they value, what they will preserve, and what they will sacrifice.

text_script.value: Embrace transformation boldly
The Nineteenth Men shed old constraints. Their selfless nature drives them toward radical change, though some mourn what is lost.
Preserve continuity with ancestors
The Nineteenth Men honor their origins. Their visionary traditions carry forward, even as the cosmos changes around them.
Let diversity flourish without doctrine
The Nineteenth Men refuse to choose one path. A thousand experiments bloom, though coherence suffers.

prompt_script.value: Crisis strikes the Nineteenth Men: the bridges they build may not be for human crossing. The Bridge Builders demands a response that will shape all future generations.

text_script.value: Centralize authority to survive
Power concentrates. The Nineteenth Men sacrifice autonomy for coordination, and the crisis is contained—at a cost to individual expression.
Scatter and let the fittest survive
The Nineteenth Men disperse. Many perish, but the survivors carry hardened variations into the future.
Transform radically to fit the crisis
The Nineteenth Men remake themselves. What emerges barely resembles what entered the crucible, but it survives.
Endure through austerity and patience
The Nineteenth Men tighten their belts and wait. Generations pass in hardship, but the core endures unchanged.

prompt_script.value: The Nineteenth Men face the morph-question: whether successors must resemble their creators. Their answer will define what 'human' means for the next epoch.

text_script.value: Enhance cognition above all
Minds expand. The Nineteenth Men think thoughts their ancestors couldn't conceive, though they struggle to explain them to their children.
Optimize for physical resilience
Bodies harden. The Nineteenth Men become nearly indestructible, trading flexibility for permanence.
Pursue refined pleasure and meaning
Joy deepens. The Nineteenth Men cultivate experiences of such intensity that mere survival seems barbaric.
Embrace radical plasticity
Form becomes fluid. The Nineteenth Men can reshape themselves at will, though identity becomes a question rather than an answer.

prompt_script.value: Not all Nineteenth Men agree on the path forward. A faction emerges with a different vision, and the Bridge Builders may split in two.

text_script.value: Negotiate a careful federation
Diplomacy prevails. The factions remain distinct but connected, sharing resources while pursuing separate experiments.
Let them go in peace
The Nineteenth Men bid farewell to their cousins. Two branches of humanity now walk separate roads into the dark.
Enforce unity by any means
The majority compels the minority. The Nineteenth Men remain one, but the cost is measured in resentment and suppressed dissent.

The Nineteenth Men archive but do not worship. They learn from ancestors they have no intention of resembling.
Forget selectively for sanity
Some histories are sealed. The Nineteenth Men choose psychological health over completeness, though scholars protest.

encounters.title: Age 20: Last Men vs The Counter Archivist

prompt_script.value: The Counter Archivist materializes with a mirror-ledger. 'The Last Men claim progress. I have documented every regression, every atrocity conveniently forgotten.'

text_script.value: Engage their challenge with evidence
You meet argument with argument. The contest of narratives begins in earnest, and truth—whatever that means—may emerge from the clash.
Ignore them and proceed
You turn away. The Counter Archivist notes your dismissal with cold satisfaction. Their ledger grows heavier with your silence.
Accept some of their corrections
You yield ground strategically. The official record shifts slightly, and the Counter Archivist's hostility softens—for now.

prompt_script.value: They became mathematics that dreams. No substrate, no location, no death—only the endless elaboration of form. The universe will forget it ever contained anything so crude as matter.
They found the loopholes in physics. Reality itself became negotiable. What they are now has no name in any language, no place in any taxonomy. They simply are, and the cosmos adjusts.
A slow, austere intelligence that will outlast the stars. They keep promises in a thinning universe and treat rarity like scripture. When the last proton decays, they will note it with approval.
Individual and collective became gradient, not boundary. They are one mind dreaming it is many, many minds knowing they are one. Loneliness is a myth they tell to frighten children.
The Counter Archivist's ledger became the only history. Every myth annotated, every triumph recontextualized. Truth won, but it was their truth—cold, complete, and merciless.
They harvest gravity and time. Black holes become engines, temples, and roads. Their wonder is measured in horizons crossed, in singularities tamed, in the geometry of spacetime itself.
They abandoned bodies and even simulations, persisting as transmissible stories and proofs that can reboot a mind anywhere. They are ideas now, contagious and immortal.
No single path prevailed. The future became a portfolio: many forms, many ethics, stitched together by careful translation protocols. Diversity itself became the highest value.
Paradise without self-deception. A disciplined aesthetic that turns reality into art without lying about what it depicts. They experience joy that knows itself completely.
